categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: The "Green Ellipse" was the name given to a ruined city on the planet Asation that was completely abandoned by the time of the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Considered to be one of Asation's three noteworthy landmarks alongside the city of Satikan and the Grand Hypergate, the Green Ellipse was eons old by the Galactic War, and at the time it was forbidden even to members of the Gree species.
The Green Ellipse first appeared in the "Terror from Beyond" Operation in the 2011 video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
